title: Google\Cloud\PubSub\V1\SchemaSettings
name: SchemaSettings
description:
Settings for validating messages published against a schema.

Generated from protobuf message google.pubsub.v1.SchemaSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.schema
params.description: Required. The name of the schema that messages published should be validated against. Format is projects/{project}/schemas/{schema}. The value of this field will be _deleted-schema_ if the schema has been deleted.

methods.name: getSchema
methods.description:
Required. The name of the schema that messages published should be validated against. Format is projects/{project}/schemas/{schema}. The value of this field will be _deleted-schema_ if the schema has been deleted.
